title: Flag of Estonia
cardDescription: The national flag of Estonia is a tricolor featuring three equal horizontal bands of blue (top), black, and white.
description: The national flag of Estonia is a tricolor featuring three equal horizontal bands of blue (top), black, and white. In Estonian it is colloquially called the “sinimustvalge” (literally “blue-black-white”), after the colors of the bands.

content.content: It's important to choose a good shade of blue to make the flag look right. Choose a shade of blue that is not too bright but more of a light blue one.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
